summary: TOOK CAR TO DEALER BECAUSE AIRBAG LIGHT INDICATOR ON DASHBOARD WAS LIT- WAS TOLD BY TECHNICIAN THE AIRBAG IGNITOR WOULD NEED TO BE REPLACED FOR $300.  DESPITE THE EXPIRATION OF THE WARRANTY, THIS COST OF THE REPAIR SHOULD BE COVERED BY MANUFACTURER/DEALER SINCE THIS IS A MANUFACTURER DEFECT.  *JB
